attributes.action: Make it Illegal for Travelers to setup Camp without Permission.
attributes.additional_details: There are Many issues some cause with Abuse, Foul Language, Fights and Theft plus Damage it getting in and once in Churning the ground up, the Costs of cleaning up and Repairs which should come under Criminal Damage.
attributes.background:
Stop the none legal Camps being setup at will, Costs the Councils and Land Owners money taking action through no fault of their own, this Costs the Victim Only Money while they just repeat their actions over and over again, should be Wrong in Law.

Let's get the Law changed and protect Locals.
